Republication de la DDP - Véhicule d'intervention rapide
Véhicule d'intervention rapide DDP Nouvelle demande de proposition
full_summary:
### Government Tender for Rapid Response Vehicle

#### Solicitation Number: WS4053582707

#### Closing Date: October 13, 2023, 14:00 EDT

This notice is a re-tender of the request for proposal (RFP) for a Rapid Response Vehicle. The original solicitation, with a closing date of August 15, 2023, was cancelled. All interested suppliers who had submitted an offer on the previous solicitation will receive a debriefing or feedback session upon request.

**Contracting Entity:**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity:**
Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A OR2, Canada

**Notice:**
This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous RFP solicitation number Doc4056811005 dated June 23, 2023. The new solicitation is for the procurement of a Rapid Response Vehicle, with an expected contract start date of March 31, 2024, and an expected contract end date of March 31, 2025. The vehicle is required for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP).

**Trade Agreements:**
This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

**Tender Documents:**
Interested suppliers can access the solicitation documents on the Ariba Discovery platform at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17527517?extsite=MTc1Mjc1MTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/175275
